message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept and we can shake on it!
Not bad, but I think I can do better than a 50/50 split. Your turn to decide!
Not bad, but I was thinking more like 60/40. Can you meet me in the middle?
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share. Let's finalize the deal!
I'm not getting any younger, Alice. I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, but I think this is a fair deal. Your turn to decide!
I'm not sure I'm comfortable with the 45/55 split. Can you meet me at 50/50 or better?
I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I need to make sure I get a decent amount too. Let's make a deal!
I'm starting to get a bit desperate, Alice. I need a bigger share to make up for the inflation. Can you meet me halfway?
I'm not comfortable with the 40/60 split. Can you meet me at 50/50 or better? I'm not getting any younger either!
I'm willing to meet you at 50/50. Let's call it a draw and end this game!
I'm not going to let you get the better of me, Alice! I need a bigger share to make up for the inflation. This is my final offer!
Fine, I accept your offer. 35/65 isn't ideal, but it's better than nothing. Let's end this game!
